name: Angus Steak and Salad
description: Indulge in the perfect blend of succulence and freshness with our Angus Steak and Salad. Crafted for those following a high-protein, low-carb, and low-sugar diet, this recipe is a testament to healthy eating without compromising on taste. With tender Angus ribeye steak and a refreshing salad featuring cherry tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, croutons, and more, it's ideal for anyone looking to keep their meals nutritious and delicious.
recipeIngredient: 1.50  ear small (5-1/2" to 6-1/2" long), Corn, sweet, white, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the lettuce, cherry tomatoes, and sweet corn under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the sweet corn in boiling water for about 7 minutes, then set aside to cool.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season the Angus ribeye steak with salt and pepper on both sides.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium-high heat, cook the steak for about 4 to 5 minutes on each side for medium-rare, or until desired doneness. Allow it to rest for a few minutes after cooking, then slice thinly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the tomatoes into halves, slice the mozzarella cheese, and crumble the soft tofu.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cooled corn off the cob.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, cherry tomatoes, sliced mozzarella, corn kernels, and tofu. Toss lightly to mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Top the salad with croutons and the sliced steak.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, accompanied by your dressing of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
